author: Aditya Sharma
comment: I like the watchface and i have it on from the past 6 months, but i need to sat that there are not many updates. We need some new backgrounds for the watchface and more bugs fixes in syncing of the phone battery. Even some more customisation for the time and date and how to place them. It is an expensive watchfacecompared to other watchfaces and when you buy expensive stuff u expect regular updates and new things.

author: Stephen Stutz
comment: I miss being able to change the color of the ambient light like that of the not pro version, just black and white is boring. Perhaps they can push out an update? Besides that it's my favorite watch face so far.

author: Michael W
comment: Just an awesome watch face. Love the customization, look of the date/cal and weather, the overall look of everything is just really good. This and  A4-1 round are my two favorite watch faces and I've gone through tons. I'm very picky. Good job Dev👍👍👍👍👍

author: Lotfi Jabber
comment: Edit : does no work well with Android wear 2.0. Colors do not switch, watch face cannot be customized. Please fix  Love this watch face design!! Great job devs. However, the watch face sometimes takes a few seconds to redraw...

author: Mario Castillo
comment: I used to love it... Before Android wear 2.0, now I can't customize anything, I just get the ambient screen all the time and sometimes a background. Horrible, and haven't seen an update in ages.

author: Mihai Dragan
comment: Good watch face. The only issue I've  encountered is the weather widget seems to get the wrong date. It is showing summer temperatures in winter :)

author: Arlene Luciano
comment: Love this watchface but this week it stopped working on my Huawei watch. I can only get the free version to work. I paid for the Pro -version a while back to be able to use the different options. This has been my daily watchface since then. Can this be fixed? I really like it.

author: John Martinez
comment: This is my all time favorite app for my watch. To me, it has style like no other. I change to others from time to time but I always come back to this one. Love it..

author: Ian Sterling
comment: This *was* my favorite watch face, but after my watch updated itself to Android Wear 2.0, it's no longer compatible. Lowering my rating to 1 star until it gets updated.

author: Dominick Baldini
comment: The weather widget is incorrect.  The app shows my correct location but the weather is wrong.  I'm currently in California where it was 80° yesterday but the widget said it was 35°.  Please fix this!

author: Ray Sir
comment: This was my favorite watch face until my watch upgraded to Android Wear 2.0, and now seems to be incompatible.  One that's fixed, back up to 5 stars

author: Andras Sovany
comment: One of the best design out there with not too many features. Weather widget does not update. Calendar is not linked to Google/reminders etc. which makes it less important. Would be good to see more customization options like shortcuts to apps.

author: Graham Thompson
comment: Lovely watch face. Great design, looks really nice and people often comment on it, which doesn't happen very often so it must look good! Great work...

author: Charlie Kempson
comment: One of my absolute favourite faces. However, on Wear 2.0 I have to swap away from the face and back for changes on the phone app to sync

author: David Mastovich
comment: Not sure but all the sudden this is no longer compatible with my Asus Zenwatch 3. Was it because it was upgraded and the watch face was not?

author: jim ballantyne
comment: Hauwei smart watch 2 sport did give 5 Stars but the app is not letting me change face in Android Wear on my honor 7x really hope Dev team are reading reviews and fix with update when this happens will give 5 Stars again

author: Tim Lake
comment: I love this face, especially all the customisation options. Seems pretty good on battery and the ambient options are nice (a lot of watches allow loads of customisation on the normal face but not the ambient mode). Is there a way we could save our personal customisations in a future version?

author: Владислав Глаголев
comment: Android O: phone's battery indicator is stuck on 89% after update.

author: Wojciech Zając
comment: I would like to be able to change weather info provider as default one is too often misleading. Everything else is perfect.

author: Rob Simpson
comment: Paid for watchface will not install after 360 factory reset!! Stolen my money thieves

author: Alexey Akimov
comment: Add more weather providers, current one is very inaccurate.  Switched weather to step counter - doesn't work either

author: Chris Ng
comment: how to make show without the bg texture on ambient mode same as the rugged2  free version?

author: Da Xiong
comment: Purchased the pro version.  Does not work on Huawei watch.

author: Yama Pearmrasri
comment: it not work on my moto360sport and I can refund money back too

author: Arul Deepthi
comment: Not applying changes after the android wear 2.0 update on my fossil

author: Sam Tran
comment: Would be 5 star if option was added to flip the angle...or maybe set custom angle.  Pretty please?

author: Ariane Evans
comment: I love this watch face, it's ace!!!! There's so many choices, you can choose the colours you want, tye communication is fab to help you along.

author: Aaa Aaa
comment: Does the calendar show events? Am i missing something?

author: Wilf Moralee
comment: It's a nice looking watch face but phone battery icon is stuck at 60% right now

author: justin arnold
comment: Black screen after 2.0 update.

author: Jason Howard-Carter
comment: Pro does not work on Huawei

author: Sanjay Gandhi
comment: It's one of the best stylish watch faces around, so 5 🌟, works very well  😊

author: David Alvarado
comment: Best watch app. Great add-ons!

author: Oscar Ruiz
comment: I have the pro version but it's now nowhere to be found to select it!

author: Stanislav Kateliev
comment: After updating to Android 7.1.1 watch face is not showing anymore

author: Dean Lawrence
comment: My favourite by far!!! This watch face draws so much attention.  The Pro is the best by far....Love it!!! 👍

author: David Thompson
comment: Love it but it won't update new screens when I change the layout or colours

author: gopi nathan
comment: Not working in MsFit wear.

author: Ray Seowoo Choi
comment: weather still not fixed

author: Nebojsa Bozic
comment: Why I can't instal it on my Huawei Watch any more?
